mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.id AS "id", a.menu_id AS "menuId", a.name AS "name", a.class_name AS "className", a.t_field AS "field", a.t_express AS "express", a.t_value AS "value", a.sql_segment AS "sqlSegment", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM sys_datarule a JOIN sys_role_datarule rd ON rd.datarule_id = a.id JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = rd.role_id AND r.useable='1' JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.id = #{id} WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 AND u.del_flag = 0
